Also how reliable are those hinges?

They are hard to work with. For the tasks I used them for they are great though, if made properly and tested. The door for the HAB in particular, will not break under normal use, ie, as intended. But the tolerances are absolutely tiny so it can be frustrating. I think I have them mastered now though.

They cannot take much weight or work vertically so as bearings for powered objects or larger craft they are too weak. But they are the smallest possible hinge in the game and when coupled with the no offset mod you can do some pretty impressive things. I love trying to make things smaller and more elegant.

I have a few more ideas for these things too.
